My Goals

The reason most people never reach their goals is that they don't define them, learn about them, or even seriously consider them as believable or achievable. Winners can tell you where they are going, what they plan to do along the way, and who will.

1

Become Well Rounded

I plan to continue learning as much as possible in hopes of mastering web development. I already have a great understanding of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript but I will continue learning and studying to further my knowledge.

2

Back End Development

Knowing how things work are very important when it comes to anything. It's even more important when building a product or should I say fixing a product. I want to dive more into the back end of development with plans of starting with PHP and Java

3

Cloud Platform

Most companies of all sizes and domains are now shifting their environments into Cloud for cost-saving and better scalability, which means sooner or later, I will work with cloud-native applications in some type.

4

Machine Learning & AI

I've always been a huge fan of Elon Musk and his products so when I first started my journey into coding I started learning Python. It's a high-level and general purpose programming language that can used for some pretty awsome things. Looking forward to learning some more Python as I progress.
